name: Levelhead Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Levelhead's soundtrack, written by Fat Bard, is an exploration of moody ambiance, groovy beats, and catchy dance tracks. The electronic score revisits a few familiar instruments from Crashlands, and mixes them in with fresh ideas to breathe new life into the Levelhead world. The song order is specifically chosen to showcase a smooth listening experience of growing and relaxing intensity.

Tracks
01 Levelhead
02 Dispatch Via Intergalactic Railgun Power
03 Tree Twister
04 The Zone
05 Hidden Oasis
06 Rock Hopper
07 Shirk Blubber
08 Sanding Edges
09 Final Touches
10 Butter Flies
11 Canopy Slam
12 Mechoes
13 Woanope Sunrise
14 Zero Degrees
15 Crystallized Thoughts
16 Reflective Play
17 Shaded Grotto
18 Breakroom Bop
19 Chief Creative Officer
20 Gallum Warpcore
21 Disaster Manager
22 Death Executive
23 Professional Development
24 Your Goods Delivered Real Good

The directory to the files is: steamapps\common\Levelhead\Fat Bard
